command_details.name: discard
command_details.description: discard the selected card and place it on top of the game discard pile

command_details.name: draw
command_details.description: draw a new card or the top card of the discard deck

card_types.Help: Story lines that can also be used as Opening lines.

action_types.Help: Play a 'meanwhile' in front of a story element that just doesn't make sense in the place or time of the narrative.
action_types.example: play 100 234   Play action card #100 adding 'Meanwhile' in front of story card# 234, adding both to your story.

action_types.Help: Discard up to 4 cards and draw replacements.
Trade an Opening or Story element that has been played with that from another player's story.
A player steals a story card from a story played by another player.
Each player selects a card from their hand and passes it to the person to their left.
Change up to 2 character names on a selected story card to a different alias or pronoun.
action_types.example: play 105 3 Nick/Michael   Play action card #105 changing the name 'Nick' to 'Michael' in story line# 3

action_types.Help: Change the order of lines in your story.
action_types.example: play 106 2,3,4 4,2,3   Play action card #106 changing the order of lines 2,3,4 to 4,2,3

action_types.Help: Add a bespoke line, written by you, to your story.
action_types.example: play 107 'She new it was a mistake!' Play action card #106 adding a new line to the story.

cards.Help: Examples lines for illustration only. Game cards are loaded from genre text files

Opening.text: The old house on the hill had been abandoned for decades, but something inside still whispered in the darkness.
The air was thick with cigarette smoke and desperation - a familiar scent in this part of town.

Opening/Story.text: The old house on the hill had been abandoned for decades, but something inside still whispered in the darkness.
In the heart of the city, four paths converged as alliances shifted and secrets unraveled, the night promised intrigue and danger.

Closing.text: The city was asleep. The joints were closed. The rats and hoods and killers were in their holes.
